item.title: Business correspondents meet Irdai, seek consent to sell insurance products - Business Standard
item.description:
Business Correspondents Seek Irdai's Consent to Sell Insurance Products

Last Updated: Dec 24 2024 | Source: Business Standard

The Business Correspondent Resource Council (BCRC) is advocating for field agents to be permitted to sell insurance products, expanding their role beyond just banking services. This is in response to climate-related challenges impacting vulnerable populations.

  • BCRC requests permission from Irdai for business correspondents to sell insurance.
  • The current role of business correspondents is limited to providing last-mile banking services.
  • There is a growing need for weather-indexed insurance to support those affected by climate issues.
BCRC argues that climate-related shocks disproportionately affect those at the bottom of the pyramid.

This initiative aims to improve livelihood security by offering timely support through insurance payouts based on weather conditions.

item.title: Meta’s 2025 vision: Ray-Ban Smart Glasses to get built-in display, report suggests | Mint - Mint
item.description:
Meta’s 2025 vision: Ray-Ban Smart Glasses to get built-in display, report suggests

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Financial Times

Meta is set to enhance its Ray-Ban smart glasses by introducing built-in displays in 2025, aimed at providing notifications and integrating with Meta’s AI technology.

  • The new glasses will offer a more immersive and hands-free user experience.
  • They will provide functions such as navigation directions and enhanced notifications from phones and smartwatches.
  • Currently, Ray-Ban smart glasses utilize audio features for user interaction.
  • Competitors like Samsung and Google are also developing advanced smart glasses.
  • The design will retain a sleek, classic look while integrating advanced technology.
“The addition of a display is expected to significantly enhance user interaction, bridging the gap between fashion and functionality.”

The update could improve Meta's position in the competitive smart glasses market by offering enhanced features that meet consumer demands.

item.title: OnePlus 13 has a new vegan leather, ‘micro-curve’ around flat display, more - 9to5Google
item.description:
OnePlus 13 Features New Vegan Leather and Micro-Curve Display

Publication Date: December 22, 2024 Source: 9to5Google

Ahead of its launch in January, OnePlus has detailed a few more points around the hardware of the OnePlus 13, including a new type of vegan leather and how its flat display isn’t really flat.

  • New “Microfiber Vegan Leather” backplate designed for a natural grip and durability.
  • Flat display features a “micro-curve” for better hand feel and drop resistance.
  • The device boasts a 6,000 mAh silicon battery and IP68/IP69 ratings for water resistance.
  • Balancing design with 50/50 weight distribution for a more ergonomic experience.
  • Launch date set for January 7, 2025.
“Better in your hand than any other phone” - Ryan Ruan, OnePlus' Head of Industrial Design

The OnePlus 13 emphasizes innovative design, sustainability, and user comfort, setting a high bar for the upcoming flagship device.

item.title: 2024: a good year for earbuds - The Verge
item.description:
2024: A Good Year for Earbuds

Publication Date: 2024

Source: The Verge

The year 2024 has been excellent for wireless earbuds, with major tech companies releasing competitive models featuring innovative technologies. Users can expect improved functionalities across multiple brands.

  • Leading brands like Apple, Samsung, and Google have released impactful models with notable features.
  • Apple’s AirPods Pro 2 have introduced advanced hearing health features.
  • Samsung's voice controls have been highlighted as particularly user-friendly.
  • New entrants like Nothing have shown strong competition in design and pricing.
  • Jabra exited the consumer earbuds market, marking a significant shift in the industry.
“Apple’s AirPods Pro 2 can now function as clinical-grade hearing aids for people with mild to moderate hearing loss.”

Overall, the earbuds market is evolving with more features aimed at health tracking and seamless integration into user lifestyles.

item.title: Exclusive: OnePlus's head of industrial design on delivering the 'best in-hand feel' with the OnePlus 13 - Android Central
item.description:
Exclusive: OnePlus's head of industrial design on delivering the 'best in-hand feel' with the OnePlus 13

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Android Central

The article provides insights into the design philosophy behind the OnePlus 13, highlighting a shift towards a boxier design while maintaining a focus on improved in-hand feel and durability.

  • OnePlus maintained a consistent design language since the OnePlus 3, prioritizing a great in-hand feel.
  • The OnePlus 13 features a new boxy design and a vegan leather back for enhanced grip and durability.
  • The design team aimed to create the best in-hand feel with a focus on secure grip and durability.
  • The phone includes a flat AMOLED panel with a 2.5D micro-curve ratio to improve touch experience and avoid accidental touches.
  • It utilizes a custom Ceramic Guard for superior drop protection and scratch resistance.
  • The OnePlus 13 will adopt silicon battery technology for improved energy density and durability.
  • The design includes IP68 and IP69 resistance ratings for water and dust protection.
“We worked hard to make OnePlus 13 feel better in your hand than any other phone,” said Ryan Ruan.

This design overhaul signifies OnePlus's commitment to innovation while enhancing user experience with superior materials and technology.

item.title: Oppo A5 Pro 5G With MediaTek Dimensity 7300 SoC, 6,000mAh Battery Launched: Price, Features - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Oppo A5 Pro 5G With 6,000mAh Battery, 80W Fast Charging Launched

Publication Date: Tuesday

Source: Gadgets 360

The Oppo A5 Pro 5G has been launched in China, showcasing a robust build and impressive specifications designed for modern smartphone users.

  • Features an octa-core MediaTek Dimensity 7300 SoC.
  • Available with up to 12GB of RAM and 512GB of storage.
  • Offers a 6,000mAh battery with 80W fast charging capabilities.
  • Water and dust resistance with IP66, IP68, and IP69 ratings.
  • Equipped with a 6.7-inch full-HD+ AMOLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate.
  • Includes a dual-camera setup with a 50-megapixel primary sensor.
  • Comes in four color options: New Year Red, Quartz White, Rock Black, and Sandstone Purple.
“The Oppo A5 Pro houses a 6,000mAh battery with support for up to 80W wired fast charging.”

This smartphone is confirmed for sale later this month, starting with pre-orders followed by a general availability on December 27.

item.title: OnePlus 12 gets a MASSIVE discount ahead of the OnePlus 13 launch. Should you buy it? | Mint - Mint
item.description:
OnePlus 12 Gets Significant Discount Ahead of OnePlus 13 Launch

Publication Date: January 7, 2025
Source: Live Mint

Tech giant OnePlus is preparing for the launch of its next-generation flagship smartphone, the OnePlus 13, and in the meantime, the OnePlus 12 is now available at a significant discount on Amazon.

  • The OnePlus 12, launched in January 2024, is now priced at ₹59,999, down from ₹64,999 for the 12GB RAM and 256GB storage model.
  • The 16GB RAM and 512GB storage variant is now available for ₹64,999, reduced from ₹69,999.
  • An additional bank discount of ₹7,000 is available with certain credit cards, bringing the effective prices down to ₹52,999 and ₹57,999 respectively.
  • The OnePlus 12 features a Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 chipset, a 120Hz curved AMOLED display, and a robust camera system, making it a competitive flagship option.
“For those who prioritize premium specifications but are hesitant to invest in the latest flagship devices, this offer provides an excellent opportunity to own a high-performing smartphone at a reduced price.”

With this discount, the OnePlus 12 poses a strong alternative for users looking for premium features without the need to buy the latest device.

item.title: Amazon Christmas Sale: Get Honor 200 Pro, Honor Magic 6 Pro, and more at a discount | Mint - Mint
item.description:
Amazon Christmas Sale: Discounts on Honor Smartphones

Publication Date & Source: December 2023, Live Mint

Christmas is approaching, making it an ideal time to find gifts for loved ones. Amazon offers significant discounts on popular smartphone models, helping you choose the perfect gift without breaking the bank.

4 smartphones to buy during Christmas Sale

  • Honor 200 Pro: Priced at Rs. 44,999, down from Rs. 59,999, featuring a 6.78-inch AMOLED display, Snapdragon 8s Gen 3 processor, and a triple camera setup.
  • Honor Magic 6 Pro: Available for Rs. 89,999, this flagship model offers a 6.8-inch FHD+ display and a 180 MP camera.
  • Honor X9b: Discounted to Rs. 24,999, it includes a 6.78-inch AMOLED display and a 108MP camera.
  • Honor 200 Lite: At just Rs. 18,999, it presents a budget-friendly option with a 6.7-inch display and MediaTek processor.
“With great deals, you get the perfect Christmas gift without emptying your pockets.”

Take advantage of these offers this holiday season to find the ideal smartphone for your family and friends.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Series to Hit Store Shelves Two Weeks After Galaxy Unpacked Event: Report - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy S25 Series Said to Go on Sale in February Next Year

Publication Date: December 21, 2024

Source: Gadgets 360

The upcoming Samsung Galaxy S25 series, including the Galaxy S25 Slim, is rumored to be revealed at a Galaxy Unpacked event on January 23, 2025. The phones are expected to launch in Korea on February 7, 2025, following a pre-order period.

  • The Galaxy S25 series will include four variants: Galaxy S25, Galaxy S25+, Galaxy S25 Ultra, and Galaxy S25 Slim.
  • Pre-orders are set to begin on January 24, 2025, and last until February 3, 2025.
  • The official sale is expected to start on February 4, 2025.
  • Previous Galaxy S models typically launched two weeks after their reveal.
  • The S25 Ultra variant is expected to feature 16GB RAM and 512GB of storage, utilizing the Snapdragon 8 Elite processor.
“Samsung started sale of previous Galaxy S series around two weeks after they were unveiled at the Galaxy Unpacked events.”

Overall, the new Galaxy S25 series aims to continue Samsung's legacy of flagship smartphones with advanced features and performance aimed at consumers looking for high-quality devices in the smartphone market.

item.title: Poco X7 Pro 5G Global Variant Design Renders, Key Specifications Leaked; Said to Get 6,000mAh Battery - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Poco X7 Pro 5G Global Variant Design Renders and Key Specifications Leaked

Publication Date: October 2023, Source: Gadgets 360

The Poco X7 Pro 5G is anticipated to launch soon in select global markets, including India. Recently leaked design renders and specifications provide insights into the smartphone's features.

  • The phone will have three color options with a dual-tone finish.
  • It is expected to feature a 50-megapixel OIS main camera.
  • Powered by a 4nm MediaTek Dimensity 8400-Ultra SoC with significant performance boosts.
  • Projected to have a 6.67-inch 120Hz AMOLED display.
  • Equipped with a 6,000mAh battery and 90W wired HyperCharging support.
“Poco X7 Pro 5G may be the first phone in India to ship with HyperOS 2.0.”

The Poco X7 Pro 5G aims to offer cutting-edge design and features to compete in the global smartphone market.

item.title: Asus ROG Strix Laptop With RGB Underglow Teased Ahead of Launch at CES 2025 - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Asus ROG Strix Laptop With RGB Underglow Teased Ahead of Launch

Date: January 6, 2025 | Source: Gadgets 360

Asus has teased a new laptop from its ROG Strix series, set to be unveiled at CES 2025. While specific details are scarce, the laptop will feature RGB lighting, including an underglow effect.

  • The Asus ROG Strix laptop debuts on January 6, 2025.
  • It may be accompanied by the ROG Strix Scar 16 and ROG Strix Scar 18.
  • The new models are expected to use Intel Core Ultra 9 processors and Nvidia's RTX 50-series graphics cards.
  • Additionally, Asus may unveil a gaming tablet alongside the laptops at CES 2025.
"The upcoming laptop will sport RGB lighting that will be visible as an underglow."

The teaser suggests a significant design evolution with a focus on RGB aesthetics, appealing to gaming enthusiasts.

item.title: Apple MacBook Air with M4 chip could launch even before iPhone SE 4 - India Today
item.description:
Apple's M4-powered MacBook Air may launch sooner than expected

Published On: Dec 24, 2024

Published By: Nandini Yadav

Apple’s M4 chips are powering high-performance devices, and the anticipated MacBook Air with M4 is speculated to launch ahead of the iPhone SE 4.

  • Mark Gurman from Bloomberg hints that the MacBook Air M4 could be released earlier than the iPhone SE 4, scheduled for Spring 2025.
  • The new MacBook Air is expected to consist of a 13-inch and a 15-inch model with minor design updates and the M4 chip.
  • Apple's accidental confirmation of new MacBook Air models in a macOS update suggests they are coming in 2025.
  • There are rumors of performance improvements and potential upgrades like a Center Stage camera.
  • The M4 chip shows a 25% performance boost over the M3 chip according to Geekbench results.
“Apple could possibly start selling the laptop in the first quarter of 2025.”

The MacBook Air powered by M4 chip may signal a shift in Apple's usual product launch schedule, potentially announced through a press release rather than an event.

item.title: ChatGPT can now be used on WhatsApp: Here’s how to get started | Mint - Mint
item.description:
ChatGPT can now be used on WhatsApp: Here’s how to get started

Publication Date: Last week

Source: OpenAI

OpenAI recently announced that ChatGPT will be available on WhatsApp as a dedicated bot, allowing users to text chat and get assistance with various tasks.

To use ChatGPT on WhatsApp, follow these steps:

  • Save ChatGPT number as a contact: +18002428478.
  • Find ChatGPT on WhatsApp: Search for ChatGPT in contacts.
  • Ask ChatGPT: Begin chatting by asking questions via text.

US-based users can call ChatGPT

In the US, users can also call ChatGPT at 1-800-CHATGPT for assistance.

“Calls are limited to 15 minutes per session and are completely free.”

This new feature streamlines access to ChatGPT for users in WhatsApp and provides additional utility for those in the US.

item.title: WhatsApp to Discontinue Support for These Android Phones in 2025 - CIOL
item.description:
WhatsApp to Discontinue Support for These Android Phones in 2025

Publication Date: Available in the article Source: Available in the article

WhatsApp, the most widely used messaging app globally, is set to end support for older Android smartphones running Android KitKat (Android 4.4) or earlier versions on January 1, 2025. This decision comes as the app continues to evolve, requiring more advanced hardware and software to function effectively.

Affected Devices: Full List of Smartphones

  • Samsung: Galaxy S3, Galaxy Note 2, Galaxy Ace 3, Galaxy S4 Mini
  • Motorola: Moto G (1st Gen), Motorola Razr HD, Moto E (2014)
  • HTC: One X, One X+, Desire 500, Desire 601, Optimus G, Nexus 4
  • LG: G2 Mini, L90
  • Sony: Xperia Z, Xperia SP, Xperia T, Xperia V

It’s essential for users of these devices to back up their WhatsApp data to avoid losing messages and media when support ends. Upgrading to a compatible device is advised for continued access to WhatsApp’s features.

What Should You Do If Your Phone Is on the List?

  • Back Up Your WhatsApp Data: Go to Settings > Chats > Chat backup and choose a backup frequency.
  • Upgrade Your Device: Consider purchasing a newer smartphone that supports the latest WhatsApp features.
  • Transfer Data to New Device: Restore your backup on the new device using your Google Drive backup.

For further reading on technology-related topics, check links to articles regarding AI tools and ethical dilemmas.

item.title: The 11 biggest tech flops of 2024, ranked – from Windows Recall to the Apple Vision Pro - TechRadar
item.description:
The 11 biggest tech flops of 2024, ranked

Publication Date: 2024
Source: TechRadar

This article discusses the most disappointing tech products released in 2024, highlighting expert opinions and findings from a reader poll.

  • The GoPro Hero 2024 was criticized for image quality and limited recording options.
  • The Evie Ring faced execution issues with basic menstrual tracking and data analysis.
  • Windows Recall led to privacy concerns and was quickly pulled by Microsoft.
  • The New Sonos app launched without expected features, leading to user discontent.
  • Concord, a new game, failed with low player engagement and was quickly taken offline.
  • Windows 11 24H2 update was plagued by bugs affecting user experience.
  • The AirPods Max 2024 refresh disappointed with minimal upgrades.
  • Rabbit R1 was seen as an unnecessary AI companion device with limited functionality.
  • Spotify Wrapped 2024 received backlash for fewer statistics and a focus on AI.
  • Humane AI Pin underwhelmed with high expectations and disappointing execution.

“It’s still very much in the initial stages of testing” - TechRadar on Windows Recall.

The article concludes that many tech products in 2024 failed to meet user expectations, resulting in disappointment amidst high hopes.

item.title: Darko’s Product of the Year 2024 - Darko.Audio
item.description:
Darko’s Product of the Year 2024

Publication Date: December 24, 2024 | Source: Darko.Audio

This year, John Darko shares his top hi-fi products of 2024 in a special end-of-year video that showcases a selection of favorites aimed at creating a cohesive listening experience.

  • Darko reflects on the challenges of selecting 'best' products due to limited samples.
  • The picks are intended to form a complete hi-fi system.
  • This year's video runtime is longer than normal due to featuring multiple products.
  • Darko emphasizes the production effort behind the video, taking weeks to create.
  • Recommended products include Moondrop MIAD-01, Campfire Audio Clara, and FiiO R9.
“I hope you like this video as it took weeks – not days – to make.”

In conclusion, Darko's curated selection represents personal favorites that seek to inspire a brighter audio future.

item.title: MediaTek’s new mid-range chip wipes the floor with Exynos 1580 - SamMobile - Samsung news
item.description:
MediaTek's new mid-range chip wipes the floor with Exynos 1580

Date: December 24, 2024

Source: SamMobile

The MediaTek Dimensity 8400 chip represents a significant upgrade in performance compared to the Exynos 1580, boasting exclusive high-performance CPU cores and impressive graphics capabilities.

  • The Dimensity 8400 features eight ARM Cortex-A725 CPU cores with a top clock speed of 3.25GHz.
  • It offers 41% faster multi-core performance and 44% less peak power usage compared to previous models.
  • The Mali-G720 MC7 GPU provides over 2.3 TFLOPS of graphics performance, surpassing the Exynos 1580.
  • MediaTek claims the Dimensity 8400 is compatible with advanced memory and storage technologies like LPDDR5X and UFS 4.0.
  • The integrated MediaTek NPU 880 improves AI processing capabilities while maintaining high connectivity features, such as 5G support.
"The Dimensity 8400 chip is a substantial improvement in performance and efficiency for mid-range devices."

This new chip's capabilities suggest that MediaTek is poised to take the lead in the mid-range market, while Samsung's Exynos 1580 may struggle to keep up.

item.title: Scan, share, done: WhatsApp update brings in-app scanning for iOS users - details | Mint - Mint
item.description:
WhatsApp Introduces In-App Document Scanning for iOS Users

Publication Date: October 2023, Source: Live Mint

WhatsApp has launched an in-app scanning feature for iOS users, enhancing document sharing by allowing users to scan documents directly within the app.

Key Points

  • New in-app scanning feature is available in the latest WhatsApp update (version 24.25.80).
  • This feature allows users to scan documents without external tools.
  • Users can adjust scan margins for better quality.
  • The update is currently being rolled out to a select group of iOS users.
  • The feature aims to streamline document sharing for personal and professional use.
“The ability to scan and send documents directly within the instant messaging app removes the reliance on third-party scanning apps.”

This update is seen as a significant improvement in WhatsApp's document-sharing capabilities, making it a more comprehensive communication tool.

item.title: Meta adding display to new Ray-Ban smart glasses: Report - The Hindu
item.description:
Meta adding display to new Ray-Ban smart glasses: Report

Publication Date: December 24, 2024 Source: The Financial Times

Meta is set to enhance their Ray-Ban smart glasses with a display expected to launch in late 2025. The display will allow users to view notifications and interact with Meta's AI assistant, reflecting the company's commitment to advancing wearable technology.

  • The new Ray-Ban smart glasses will feature a screen for notifications.
  • Meta's Orion AR glasses were recently demoed but deemed too expensive for production.
  • Google and Samsung are introducing their own Android XR glasses in 2025.
  • The previous Ray-Ban edition included in-ear speakers, cameras, and microphones, and saw successful sales after launch.
  • Meta's CTO indicates that 2025 will be crucial for the company's Reality Labs division.
“2025 would be the most important year in the history of Reality Labs.” - Andrew Bosworth, CTO of Meta

This advancement in Meta's smart glasses signifies a focus on integrating more features and competing in the wearable tech market.
